t: Who are Decoberry's competitors?
Amazon.com: Decoberry: Traditional Collection
s: Traditional décor is one of the most familiar styles used to decorate homes, making it a well-liked style that is widely recognized. Our Traditional Collection showcases regal and re­fined curtains inspired by quintessential interiors from many different cultures and centuries.

t: Amazon.com: Decoberry: Blackout Curtains
s: A Decoberry blackout curtain is a curtain that is completely light blocking. Our blackout curtains vary from 95% - 100% blackout depending on the type of liner used. Indirectly it is an energy-saving, sound barrier that keeps your home warmer in the winter and cooler in the summer.
